alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 12:02AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, Camden, southern Glynn and northeastern Charlton Counties through 1230 AM EST... At 1202 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Folkston to Woodbine. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Folkston, Woodbine, Dock Junction, Homeland, Country Club Estates, Sea Island, Jekyll Island and St Simons Island Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton
